------------------
FAIRLinked

**Authors:**  
**Balashanmuga Priyan Rajamohan**, Kai Zheng, Benjamin Pierce, Yinghui Wu, Laura Bruckman, Erika I. Barcelos, Roger H. French

**Affiliation:**

**Python Installation:**

```bash
pip install FAIRLinked
```

**Package Usage:**

```bash
FAIRLinked
```
